prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and reactions to me when he helped me get my MVG Go account setup?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house placement.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic listing of the chart data using horary principles for your question. I have organized the information into sections:

1. Core House Representations and Rulerships
 • Querent (You): Represented by the Ascendant at 11°58′ Virgo; the ruler is Mercury.
 • Stefan: Represented by the 9th house (using the cross‐reference guide, the 9th house is the area of foreign connections); the zodiac sign on the cusp of the 9th house is Taurus, whose traditional ruler is Venus. In the chart, the 9th house contains Uranus, and Venus (as the ruler of Taurus) is placed in the 7th house.

2. Planetary Positions (as provided)
 • Sun at 12°25′ Aquarius
 • Moon at 15°42′ Pisces
 • Mercury at 6°27′ Aquarius
 • Venus at 27°29′ Pisces
 • Mars at 20°26′ Cancer (retrograde noted)
 • Jupiter at 11°17′ Gemini (retrograde noted)
 • Saturn at 17°25′ Pisces
 • Uranus at 23°15′ Taurus
 • Neptune at 27°58′ Pisces
 • Pluto at 2°03′ Aquarius
 • North Node at 29°51′ Pisces (retrograde noted)
 • Chiron at 19°30′ Aries
 • Ascendant at 11°58′ Virgo
 • Midheaven (MC) at 8°35′ Gemini
 • Imum Coeli (IC) at 8°35′ Sagittarius

3. House Divisions (as listed)
 • 1st House: Starts at 11° Virgo (contains the querent’s self-identity)
 • 5th House: Begins at 16° Capricorn; contains Sun, Mercury, and Pluto (pertinent to the querent’s creative self and personal expression)
 • 7th House: Begins at 11° Pisces; contains Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node (critical for relationships and interpersonal matters)
 • 9th House: Begins at 3° Taurus; contains Uranus (Stefan’s representative area via foreign connection)

4. Major Aspects (with orbs indicated, relevant to the question)
 • Jupiter Square Ascendant (orb: 0°)
 • MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 0°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 1°)
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury Sextile IC (orb: 2°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 2°)
 • Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 2°)
 • Moon Conjunction Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Mercury Trine MC (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 3°)        [Significant given Uranus’s placement in Stefan’s house]
 • Ascendant Square IC (orb: 3°)
 • Ascendant Square MC (orb: 3°)
 • Jupiter Opposition IC (orb: 3°)
 • Jupiter Conjunction MC (orb: 3°)
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 3°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)        [Links Stefan’s 9th house planetary energy with Venus]
 • Sun Sextile IC (orb: 4°)
 • Moon Square Jupiter (orb: 4°)
 • Moon Opposition Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury Conjunction Pluto (orb: 4°)
 • Sun Trine MC (orb: 4°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 5°)
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 5°)
 • Moon Trine Mars (orb: 5°)
 • Pluto Sextile IC (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Saturn Opposition Ascendant (orb: 6°)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 6°)
 • Pluto Trine MC (orb: 6°)
 • Moon Square IC (orb: 7°)
 • Moon Square MC (orb: 7°)
 • Mars Trine Neptune (orb: 7°)
 • Venus Trine Mars (orb: 7°)

5. Special Patterns and Chart Features
 • Grand Cross pattern involving the Midheaven (MC in Gemini), Ascendant (Virgo), Imum Coeli (IC in Sagittarius), Moon (Pisces), and Jupiter (Gemini)
 • Chart shape: Bowl shape
 • Dominant element among inner planets: Air
 • Dominant mode among inner planets: Mutable
 • The Moon is a waxing crescent, suggesting an emerging or developing situation

This compilation of data reflects the structure and relationships according to horary principles. Confirm that all listed points match your drawn chart before proceeding to the interpretive stage.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on your horary chart, Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings reveal themselves through a blend of unconventional spontaneity and a reserved yet genuine underlying admiration. His representative energy in the 9th house—emphasized by Uranus in Taurus—and the involvement of Venus (the traditional ruler of Taurus, albeit residing in Pisces) indicate that his approach was marked by an unconventional, even unexpected, impulse. The harmonious Venus sextile Uranus aspect reinforces that his act of assistance was not merely a technical gesture; it carried an undercurrent of creative, even quirky, interest.

At the same time, the querent’s indicator (the Ascendant in Virgo, ruled by Mercury in Aquarius) speaks to a methodical and rational approach, suggesting that while you noted his help, his internal reactions leaned toward an unemotional, detached style of engagement. Key aspects—such as Mars sextile Uranus and Mercury’s overall alignment with the Midheaven—suggest that Stefan’s inner reaction was activated by an innovative spark, albeit one that is filtered through a layer of emotional idealism (as further indicated by Venus’s conjunction with Neptune in the 7th house).

In clear terms:
• Stefan’s thoughts were driven by a spontaneous flair, mixing intellect with a touch of eccentricity.
• His feelings, while genuine, remained subtly detached and refracted through an idealized, almost abstract lens.
• His overall reaction to assisting you was both positive and creatively stimulating, though not overtly passionate or deeply personal in a conventional emotional sense.

This is a reading strictly based on the horary principles visible in your chart data.

mes:

 Conclusion. Intellectual, detached, but sparked unexpected curiosity. Stefan was represented by the 9th house here.
